Adwoa Amoah bụ onye na-ese ihe na Ghana na onye isi nchịkwa nke Contemporary Art na Ghana.
Amoah nwetara nzere Bachelor of Fine Art na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah Kumasi n'afọ 2003.
E gosipụtara ọrụ Amoah na Ghana nakwa na mba ụwa dịka; The Dei Centre, Artists' Alliance Gallery, Goethe-Institut na Alliance Francaise
N'ụwa niile, egosila ọrụ ya na Palacio da Cultura, Praia, CapeVerde, Alliance Francaise
A matala ya n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị ịrị na-ese ihe na-agafe ọgbọ atọ nke nwere mmetụta sitere na ụdị mba ụwa na omenala mpaghara na Loom Gallery na Accra.
